title: Chapter 3: First Taste of Freedom
subtitle: How I Fixed My Life
preview: I’ve never loved my body. By no means was it the worst but I had never had the body that I wanted and until now, I was okay with that. I just figured, well I’m already a smoker or vaper or overall unhealthy person, so what’s the point? I love food, and really I just don’t care about my  body.
